posts.post_title: WTT:  Signed Mack Callahan for T206
posts.post_content:
Paid $800+ for it in the last Imperial Sports auction.  Looking to trade it for similar value in T206s.....any players, any conditions...

Email me if you're interested -- [url]SignedT206@gmail.com[/url]
